title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on Deaths of People Crossing English Channel
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 24 November 2021.
content:
This is a sobering day for the UK Government, France and the wider international community. Lives have been lost in the most terrible of circumstances.
